title: The new client
body: I have internet access and still when I write my password it says that something is wrong with my internet connection therefore i tried to launch the legacy client which is impossible giving me another RADS error that says couldn't connect to the http server

replies.body: There was an issue with an external network incident that impacted a few of our services, causing login problems. This has since been resolved, so if you're still getting this issue, let me know.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=5HuAXXU1,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-02T05:24:15.333+0000)
>
> There was an issue with an external network incident that impacted a few of our services, causing login problems. This has since been resolved, so if you're still getting this issue, let me know.
